description: To provide high-quality air chemistry data in a timeframe that meets international and national obligations.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: CapMon Data Management and Quality Control

## Background

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking a contractor for CapMon Data Management and Quality Control, a critical component of ECCC's data management process. The project involves managing and controlling high-quality air and precipitation chemistry data to meet international and national obligations.

## Objective

The objective of this work program is to produce high-quality, quality-assured, and finalized air chemistry data files created by the contractor through objective and timely quality control and management of raw measurement data files provided by CapMon.

## Requirements

Deliverables in this work program are primarily quality-controlled air and precipitation chemistry data files. Quality control of the data must be carried out in a consistent, timely, and scientifically credible manner. The quality control and data management processes are detailed and based on carefully controlled network data flow and delivery processes.

## Technical Requirements

The contractor must utilize either the Research Data Management and Quality Control System (RDMQTM) or an RDMQ equivalent system based on SAS or a SAS equivalent platform (e.g., World Programming System). The contractor must possess a valid SAS license (9.4 or later) and a valid license for Windows 32-bit Microsoft Excel 2016 or later.

## Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity

This tender is open to all qualified contractors and adheres to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

The regions of opportunity are worldwide, and delivery will be made to Canada.
